name: GoogleJobs
description: This API arrange information of certain jobs.

parameters.name: place
parameters.description: the location or the company where the job comes from.

example.output: The Vine, Rosecrans Florist & Cafe,Tranquil Resorts,Black Fox Coffee,The Greats of Craft,PeopleReady,About Time Coffee,Sammy L coffee,Frankie Portugal,Hilton
